title: L’Amerique
description: Episode 21 of Series “Il Etait Une Fois L'homme” (= “Once Upon a Time Man”). This episode gives a very broad summary of the history of the North American continent, from the time of the arrival of the Mayflower in 1620 to the gold rush of 1849. It also covers the colonisation of Canada and the Anglo-French war.  Credits: Director, writer, Albert Barille ; photography, Jean-Louis Karcher ; art direction, Philippe Landrot, Rene Borg ; graphic research, Jean Barbaud. Cast: Roger Carel, Francine Laine, Pierre Trabaud, Henri Djanik [original French narration].
related_objects: Series; S002033; Il Etait Une Fois L'homme = Once Upon a Time Man; Active; 1978
